projects.title: ROAD RASH
projects.description: Road Rash is an old generation game created using Javascript DOM. handling the keyboard Events to control the position of Cars inside the game.

projects.title: CRYPTO.APP
projects.description: Crypto.app is build on ReactJS Library .It uses Coingecko api fetched by using axios in a async function. This app shows all the Crypto exchanges and also details of all Crypto Currencies.

projects.title: COVID 19
projects.description: Covid-19 website is build using Html css and Javascript. this website contains the information related to Covid and also the Guideliness provided by the WHO

projects.title: VIDEO HUB
projects.description: Video Hub is created using ReactJS and ChakraUI which is a simple, modular and accessible component library .This app is dual theme consisting a Light mode & a Dark mode.

projects.title: REACT CART
projects.description: React cart is created using ReactJS and Redux to maintain and update data across the applications for multiple components to share, all while remaining independent of the components.

projects.title: PORTFOLIO
projects.description: This  is my Personal Portfolio . It is build using ReactJS it uses several npm packages .This Website is also connected to database using Firebase
